articles.title: American Arrested for His Hostile Act against DPRK
articles.content:
American Arrested for His Hostile Act against DPRK
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- According to information available from a relevant institution, Warmbier Otto Frederick, student of Virginia University of the U.S., was arrested while perpetrating a hostile act against the DPRK after entering it under the guise of tourist for the purpose of bringing down the foundation of its single-minded unity at the tacit connivance of the U.S. government and under its manipulation. He is now under investigation.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Cabinet Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Cabinet Held
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- There took place an enlarged plenary meeting of the Cabinet.
					 Present there were members of the Cabinet including Premier Pak Pong Ju.
					
					 The meeting discussed the matter of thoroughly carrying out the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The meeting proposed the tasks to be fulfilled by the Cabinet this year and ways of implementing them.
					
					 It adopted a relevant decision.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Journalists Union Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of Journalists Union Held
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea held its enlarged plenary meeting in Pyongyang on Jan. 21.
					 Present at the meeting were members of the Central Committee of the journalist union, officials, journalists and media persons in the capital and provinces.
					
					 The meeting discussed the task to bring about a fresh change in the media work this year.
					
					 Chairman of the C.C., the Journalist Union of Korea Cha Sung Su made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the mass media should produce a larger number of contemporary masterpieces which would make all the service personnel and people burn their hearts with enthusiasm for the revolution and for struggle in the run up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, a turning point in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They underscored the need to conduct active media campaign to usher in a new era of independent reunification and create the international atmosphere favorable for the Korean revolution and national reunification, thus displaying the faith, will, dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 They called upon all the media persons to bring about a radical turn in newspaper, news service, radio and publication this year with their brush and mike and discharge their duty and mission as the first-line detachment that carries out and defends the idea of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Hwanghae Province
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of farming in South Hwanghae Province. He toured the waterway project, the Haeju Tractor Accessory Factory, the Haeju Trailing Farm Machine Factory and others in the province.
					 Going round various places of the waterway project, he underscored the need to increase the speed of the project and ensure the best quality of the structures.
					
					 He learned in detail about the production at the above-said two factories.
					
					 He called on the officials and workers of the factories to boost the production of modern farming machines and tractor parts by displaying the same fighting spirit and work style as done by the workers of Kunja-ri so that farm work is done by machines in the socialist cooperative fields.
					
					 The consultative meetings held on the spots called on all agricultural workers in the province to make redoubled efforts to step up the preparations for farming in a sense of responsibility that they stand guard over the first line trench on the forefront for defending socialism and took measures for the relevant units to provide sufficient amount of farm materials.

articles.title: Armed Spy Ship Pueblo, Witness to U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy
articles.content:
Armed Spy Ship Pueblo, Witness to U.S. Anti-DPRK Policy
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The incident of U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo clearly showed that any provocations of the hostile forces against the DPRK will meet only stern punishment, said Ra Yong Sun, vice-director of the Scientific Research Department of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					 He continued:
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship, which was captured by the seamen of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Jan. 23, 1968, serves as a floating museum now exhibited on the Pothong River in Pyongyang.
					
					 The Pueblo incident was a manifestation of the DPRK's right to self-defence and a due punishment dealt out upon the aggressors by the KPA seamen.
					
					 But, the U.S. imperialists answered the righteous measure taken by the DPRK with military threat to the DPRK. They even brought the incident to the UN Security Council, saying that they would not hesitate to use nukes to settle it.
					
					 At that time, the DPRK declared that it would react to the U.S. "retaliation" with stronger counteraction and to the total war with all-out war.
					
					 Eventually, the U.S. could not but make a written apology to the DPRK, in which it said:
					
					 The government of the Unites States of America shoulders full responsibility and solemnly apologizes for the grave acts of espionage committed by the U.S. ship against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea after having intruded into the territorial waters of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. The government gives firm assurance that no U.S. ships will intrude again in future into the territorial waters of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 In this regard, former President Johnson deplored that it was one and the only letter of apology signed by the U.S. in its history.
					
					 Nearly fifty years has passed since the incident, but the situation on the Korean Peninsula has been escalated as the days go by owing to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to draw a bitter lesson from its past failures, as the DPRK has already emerged as a nuclear power.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Principle of Self-reliance and Self-development
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Principle of Self-reliance and Self-development
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- It is a vital matter under the present situation where the imperialists are becoming desperate to enslave other countries and nations to advance on the principle of self-reliance and self-development, away from dependence on outside forces, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Self-development is the only way of justice and victory to protect the dignity of the country and nation and achieve genuine development and prosperity. This is the historical review of the Korean revolution which has advanced under the banner of independence. 
					
					 The DPRK neither reads other's face nor kowtows to others but does everything according to its own intention and resolution to meet its own interests as it counts on its own efforts. 
					
					 The DPRK emerged a nuclear weapons state having even H-bomb despite high-handed and arbitrary practices of nuclear powers. 
					
					 The higher the prestige of a country and nation rises, the more transparent it should be in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the stronger it should grow. 
					
					 Self-reliance and self-development is the everlasting soul of the Korean people and symbol of their dignity. 
					
					 The DPRK will never step back from the road of self-development chosen by itself. 
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK that it does not care whether aid comes from outside or not. 
					
					 Although there are a lot of difficulties and acute shortages but we will realize the people's beautiful dream and ideal by our own efforts and with indigenous technology and natural resources, proud and honored of having our own.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Pro-reunification Figure to Jail Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Pro-reunification Figure to Jail Term
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean supreme court sentenced to a jail term the former chairman of the Organizational Committee of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on Wednesday, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 At the recent trial it confirmed the original decision to sentence him to two years and two months in jail, put him on probation for four years and impose two years of suspension of qualifications on him on the charge of violation of the "Security Law.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Press on Erecting Girl Statues for Peace
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Press on Erecting Girl Statues for Peace
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- A campaign for erecting girl statues for peace is taking place in south Korea as part of protest actions against the Japanese authorities' moves to cover up the past crimes related to sexual slavery, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The committee for pressing on girl statues for peace to be erected by the rising generation said it would set up the second girl statue for peace outside the Japanese consulate in Pusan till August 15 in order to set right Japan's wrong understanding of history.
					
					 It was reported that the first girl statue for peace in Pusan will be erected at a park with March 1 as a momentum.

articles.title: Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Meets
articles.content:
Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Meets
Tokyo, January 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification was held in Tokyo on Jan. 20 to usher in a new era of independent reunification in response to the tasks for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Nam Sung Su, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other vice-chairpersons, officials of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification across Japan and officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, made a speech.
					
					 He said that Chongryon and Koreans in Japan turned out in the drive to thoroughly carry out the five-point tasks set forth by the Marshal in his important May 25 letter in order to demonstrate the might of Chongryon this significant year in line with the noble idea and intention reflected in his New Year message.
					
					 Speakers said that they would never pardon the south Korean authorities who concluded the humiliating "agreement" with the Japanese authorities on the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and mercilessly chilled the desire of the fellow countrymen demanding Japan's sincere apology and reparation for the colonial rule over Korea but wage a valiant struggle against the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Then Nam Sung U spoke at the meeting.
					
					 A decision on the movement for national reunification this year was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Marked in DR Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Marked in DR Congo
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its internet website an article titled "70 years shining with idea of attaching importance to youth" on Jan. 17, the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					 The article said:
					
					 There unfolded a great history of attaching importance to the youth and loving them in the DPRK under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who put forward the young people as a driving force of the revolution and brought up them as reliable young vanguard of the Workers' Party of Korea in the whole period of the revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 The Korean youth movement is greeting a new heyday under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the noble intentions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The young Korean people are glorifying the era and working miracles and innovations startling the world people in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu. 
					
					 Socialist Korea will more strikingly demonstrate the might of the youth power thanks to the ardent youths, vanguard fighters of the WPK vigorously advancing straight forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Un all times.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The gist of Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was carried by the January issue of the Kyrgyz newspaper Pravda Kirgistana and the bulletin of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Supported by Brazilian, Austrian Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test Supported by Brazilian, Austrian Organizations
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian and Austrian organizations made public statements on Jan. 12 and 15 in support of the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 By achieving a signal success in its H-bomb test to be specially recorded in history the DPRK proudly joined the advanced nuclear weapons states and the Korean people demonstrated the mettle of the dignified nation possessed of the strongest nuclear deterrent.
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK, a responsible nuclear weapons state, will neither be the first to use nuclear weapons nor transfer relevant means and technology under any circumstances as it had already declared as long as the hostile forces for aggression do not encroach upon its sovereignty.
					
					 We wish the Korean people fresh success in their struggle for carrying out the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in the future, too.
					
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK said:
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test is a self-defensive measure for smashing the U.S. moves for aggression and war, ensuring the country's security and safeguarding peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should surely respond to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty and opt for putting an end to the military confrontation in the peninsula which has persisted for several decades.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Jan. 15 denouncing the U.S. for sidestepping the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					 The statement recalled that the Korean Jurists Committee issued a white paper accusing the U.S. of shunning the DPRK's proposal for concluding the peace treaty.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. forces are still present in south Korea under the berets of the "UN Forces" though more than 60 years have passed since the Armistice Agreement was concluded.
					
					 The U.S. persistent military provocations and threats of aggression to the DPRK compelled it to have access to nuclear weapons in order to defend itself.
					
					 This stand of the U.S. goes to prove that it does not want peace but a war in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Durable peace is impossible in the peninsula unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Fully supporting the above-said white paper, the statement demanded the U.S. replace the AA with a peace treaty.

articles.title: British Organizations Accuse U.S. of Shunning Conclusion of Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Accuse U.S. of Shunning Conclusion of Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on Jan. 14 slamming the U.S. for sidestepping the conclusion of a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has long turned its face away from the DPRK's proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 The U.S. is a crude violator of the AA.
					
					 The AA is an international legal document concluded on the premise of building lasting peace-keeping mechanism unlike truce agreements in other countries and regions.
					
					 The abnormal situation is prevailing in the Korean Peninsula on which there is neither a war nor peace due to the U.S. opposing the conclusion of the peace treaty.
					
					 A spokesman for the supreme command of the Korean People's Army issued a statement on March 5, 2013 finally declaring as its self-defensive countermeasure that the AA has been reduced to a dead paper due to the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the defunct AA.
					
					 It should admit its criminal nature of its opposition to the conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty and immediately opt for building a peace-keeping mechanism in the peninsula.

articles.title: U.S. Hypocritical Act under Fire by Uruguayan Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Hypocritical Act under Fire by Uruguayan Newspaper
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Jan. 13th issue of the Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud carried an article titled "The DPRK's nuclear test and U.S. hypocritical act".
					 It said that after the DPRK's successful H-bomb test was reported, many countries condemned not the test but the U.S. hypocritical act.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 What lashed us into fury is the fact that it was the U.S. which was most vocal in accusing the nuclear test of the DPRK, a sovereign state, though the former stockpiled nuclear weapons more than any other countries and ignited and backed all the wars in last century and in the present century directly or indirectly.
					
					 Why do some countries claim that the U.S. nuclear weapons safeguard "freedom and democracy" in the world but the DPRK's nukes pose "threat" to world peace? This is hardly understandable.
					
					 The U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK's first H-bomb test but still keeps mum about A-bombs it dropped over Japan.
					
					 It is unbelievable that the U.S. goes unpunished for this crime.

articles.title: French Newspaper Calls for Respecting DPRK's Firm Stance
articles.content:
French Newspaper Calls for Respecting DPRK's Firm Stance
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The French newspaper Monde carried an article on the DPRK's successful H-bomb test on Jan. 13.
					 The newspaper said:
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test proved considerable progress made in its technology of developing nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK codified its access to nuclear deterrent in its constitution.
					
					 From the viewpoint of the DPRK, nuclear deterrent is the only guarantee for ensuring the country's security.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the U.S. will have to recognize the fact that the DPRK is a nuclear weapons state sooner or later.
					
					 In conclusion, it is unrealistic to urge the DPRK to dismantle its nuclear weapons as a precondition for the resumption of dialogue.
					
					 For success in any future negotiations, the U.S. will have to respect the DPRK's firm stance on security assurances.

articles.title: Detenido un norteamericano por actos hostiles a RPDC
articles.content:
Detenido un norteamericano por actos hostiles a RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun la informacion de un organo competente, Warmbier Otto Frederick, estudiante de la Universidad de Virginia de Estados Unidos quien con el rotulo del turismo entro en la RPDC, esta sometido a la averiguacion por sus actos hostiles a esta perpetrados con el objeto de descomponer la base de la unidad monolitica de este pais asiatico bajo la tolerancia y el control del gobierno de Estados Unidos.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de sesion plenaria del Consejo de Ministros
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de sesion plenaria del Consejo de Ministros
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la reunion ampliada de la sesion plenaria del Consejo de Ministros con la participacion del premier Pak Pong Ju y otros miembros del Consejo de Ministros. 
					Tambien estuvieron presentes en calidad de observadores los funcionarios directivos de los organismos adscritos directamente al Consejo de Ministros, los directores, los presidentes de los comites populares provinciales, urbanos y distritales, los presidentes de los comites provinciales de economia rural, los directores provinciales de Industria Alimentaria y de Articulos de Uso Diario y otros funcionarios de las instituciones de nivel provincial, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencias, educacion e industria pesquera, y los gerentes de la fabricas y empresas importantes. 
					
					El foro discutio la agenda "Para materializar cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo". 
					
					Ro Tu Chol, vicepremier y presidente del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los civiles coreanos celebraron el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como gran jubilo revolucionario al preparar los orgullosos regalos laborales dedicados al partido madre poniendo de manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y librando una dinamica y heroica operacion conjunta entre el ejercito y el pueblo. 
					
					El foro presento las tareas de este ano para el Consejo de Ministros y los remedios por su materializacion. 
					
					Los participantes tomaron las decisiones de registrar un viraje trascendental en las labores de sus respectivos sectores y unidades y lograr los exitos productivos sin precedentes para glorificar el VII Congreso del PTC como conclave de triunfadores y de gloria. 
					
					En la ocasion fue adoptada la resolucion correspondiente.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de sesion plenaria de CC de UPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de sesion plenaria de CC de UPC
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en esta capital la reunion ampliada de la sesion plenaria del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea. 
					Participaron los miembros del CC de la UPC, funcionarios de los organos centrales y locales de prensa e informacion, periodistas y hombres de prensa. 
					
					El foro discutio las tareas para registrar nuevos cambios en las actividades de prensa e informacion de este ano. 
					
					El presidente del CC de la UPC, Cha Sung Su presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que las editoras de periodicos, agencias noticieras, radiodifusiones y otros organos de la rama de todo el pais deben crear mucho mas obras maestras de la epoca que convoquen a todos los militares y civiles a la lucha revolucionaria con motivo del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que marcara un viraje historico en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Expresaron las decisiones de manifestar a todo el mundo la conviccion, la voluntad, la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia Paektusan mediante la campana mediatica para abrir una nueva era de la reunificacion independiente y preparar el ambiente internacional favorable a la revolucion coreana y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los periodistas y hombres de prensa a registrar este ano un nuevo viraje en los periodicos, noticias, radiodifusiones y prensa para cumplir satisfactoriamente con la mision y deber de vanguardias ideologicas y primeros combatientes de choque de la era de Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Premier coreano estudia labores de rama agricola en provincia de Hwanghae de Sur
articles.content:
Premier coreano estudia labores de rama agricola en provincia de Hwanghae de Sur
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio el campo de construccion de canal de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, la Fabrica de Piezas de Tractor de Haeju, la Fabrica de Maquina Agricola de Remolque de Haeju y otros lugares para hacer conocimiento de la marcha de los preparativos agricolas.
					Estando en varios puntos del primer destino, el premier enfatizo la necesidad de elevar mas la velocidad de la construccion y asegurar en el nivel supremo la calidad de la obra.
					
					En las dos fabricas averiguo concretamente el estado de produccion.
					
					El premier dijo que los funcionarios y los obreros de las fabricas deben producir mas las modernas maquinas agricolas y las piezas de tractor valiendose del espiritu y el estilo de la lucha de la clase obrera de la comuna de Kunja y enviarlas al campo rural, para que pongan en pleno funcionamiento las maquinas en los campos cooperativas socialistas.
					
					En las reuniones consultivas realizadas en el terreno, fueron tomadas las medidas necesarias para concentrar las fuerzas en los preparativos agricolas y suministrar suficientes las materias agricolas.

articles.title: Dignidad y prosperidad de pais y nacion consisten en autofortalecimiento, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Dignidad y prosperidad de pais y nacion consisten en autofortalecimiento, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Autofortalecerse sin depender de las fuerzas extranjeras deviene un asunto vital en la situacion actual en que recrudecen las maniobras de los imperialistas tendentes a esclavizar a otros paises y naciones.
					Asi inicia Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual fechada 22 y continua:
					
					En autofortalecerse reside el camino de la justicia y la victoria para defender la dignidad del pais y nacion y lograr el desarrollo y prosperidad autenticos, lo que es un balance historico de la Revolucion Coreana que vino avanzando bajo la bandera de la independencia.
					
					Estamos viviendo con las propias fuerzas, razon por la cual solucionamos todos los problemas segun nuestra voluntad, nuestra decision y nuestro interes sin observar la actitud de otros ni comportarnos servilmente.
					
					Hoy en dia, la RPDC se ha convertido en el pais poseedor de armas nucleares inclusive la bomba de hidrogeno frustrando la coaccion y las arbitrariedades de las potencias nucleares.
					
					Cuanto mas se eleve el prestigio del pais y la nacion, tanto mas se debe mantener el espiritu de hacerse mas fuerte con propias fuerzas y debe cultivar las fuerzas.
					
					El autofortalecimiento es el espiritu del pueblo coreano y el simbolo de la dignidad.
					
					Tanto hoy como manana, mantendremos invariablemente el principio de autofortalecerse optado por nosotros.
					
					No nos importa la asistencia exterior.
					
					Aunque tenemos muchas dificultades y escasez, lograremos con el orgullo y la dignidad sobre los nuestros el hermoso sueno e ideal del pueblo basandose en nuestros fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos.
